description.content:
- Check if file exists.
	- If not exists, create file.
    - Check if has header
    	- if has header, compare header with player class attributes
        	- append player data
        - if has header, only check if there was an addition, and add the new field
        - if not has header, add all player class attributes
        	- append player data

in-progress.title: save player class to dynamic csv file
